overview: Mykel, a 6 years old boy who wants to help his mother to resolve her financial problems, even when he does not know how. In a very naive way, Maykel, misunderstand a pamphlet he finds on the street, and thinks he has got the solution. Maykel and his brother Juan, star a children's game and bring their mother into it, making her to forget her financial issues.
title: Música Del Cielo
